titles.title: PRECISE Act of 2025
PRECISE Act of 2025
Producing Responsible Energy and Conservation Incentives and Solutions for the Environment Act of 2025

A bill to amend the Consolidated Farm and Rural Development Act and the Food Security Act of 1985 to leverage incentives for the adoption of precision agriculture practices and technology, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Agriculture, Nutrition, and Forestry.
